data.title: Royal Dutch Shell plc bonds and credit ratings information
data.summary: On this page our current outstanding publicly traded bonds and our credit ratings. These bonds were issued by Shell International Finance BV and guaranteed by Royal Dutch Shell plc. Shell International Finance BV is a 100% subsidiary of Royal Dutch Shell plc and the issuing vehicle for the Group.
data.maintext:
